title: TANFORD sets the Trade and Logistics platform to promote Tanzania globally
desc: DUBAI: THE Tanzania Freight Forwarders Representation in Dubai (TANFORD) has organised a two-day forum scheduled to take place in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, aimed at promoting Tanzania in international markets and opening up business opportunities for Tanzanian traders. title: Hewett into singles semis but loses in doubles
desc: Alfie Hewett continues his Australian Open singles title defence by beating Gordon Reid - before the British pair lose their doubles semi-final.

title: Malaysia Airlines, Singapore Airlines formalise strategic joint business partnership
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: Malaysia Airlines Bhd (MAB) and Singapore Airlines (SIA) have formalised their joint business partnership which will allow them to deepen their commercial partnership, enhance connectivity and offer greater flexibility for customers travelling between Malaysia and Singapore.

title: Conor Coady: Charlton Athletic sign Wrexham defender on loan
